title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server that lets you run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, Code Llama and other large language models locally on macOS, Linux and Windows with one command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama; chat, embed, generate completions and pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers via a lightweight fetch wrapper.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models as LLMs and embedders for chains, agents and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now named Open WebUI) with chat history, model management, RAG uploads and admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama exposing sync/async APIs, streaming, embeddings and model management.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama with idiomatic client, streaming support and interactive console examples.

title: ollama-cli (rust)
summary: Fast Rust CLI for chatting with Ollama models, featuring syntax highlighting and REPL mode.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Bring-your-own-model GitHub Copilot replacement that uses Ollama models inside VS Code.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension to chat with any Ollama model from the sidebar, generate/refactor code and explain selections.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Collection of Docker Compose stacks bundling Ollama, Open WebUI, Weaviate, qDrant and RAG examples.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Lightweight Next.js chatbot UI for Ollama with Markdown, code copy and responsive design.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run RAG pipeline using Ollama embeddings + Chroma to chat with your PDFs and text files.

title: ollama-agents
summary: Experimental multi-agent framework on top of Ollama with tool-use, reflection and planner agents.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with recipes for function calling, voice chat, RAG, fine-tune adapters and more.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module wrapping Ollama with decorators for dependency injection, guards and Swagger docs.

title: ollama-cpp-py
summary: Low-level Python bindings for llama.cpp compatible with Ollama GGUF models; exposes streaming, logits and batching.
